options.outputs: Specifies the outputs which should be rendered by TypeDoc.
options.out: Specifies the location the markdown should be written to.
options.router: Selects the router used to determine the file and folder structure.
options.lang: Sets the language of the translations used when generating documentation.
options.cleanOutputDir: Used to prevent TypeDoc from cleaning the output directory.
options.navigation: Determines how the navigation JSON structure will be built.
options.includeHierarchySummary: Specifies whether or not to generate a dedicated hierarchy page.

conversionOptions.name: Configuration
conversionOptions.description: Options that control where TypeDoc reads its configuration from.

conversionOptions.name: Input
conversionOptions.description: Options that control what files TypeDoc processes.

conversionOptions.name: Comments
conversionOptions.description: Options that control how TypeDoc parses comments.

conversionOptions.name: Organization
conversionOptions.description: Options that control how content is structured on generated pages.

conversionOptions.name: Validation
conversionOptions.description: Options that control how TypeDoc validates your documentation.
